interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Barber Hair Cutting Cape for Men Women, Made with Ultra Soft Silk Fiber, 63" x 57"
Review Date: 2021/01/03
Store: SmoTecQ
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '11.8 x 9.2 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: Works well. Full coverage and easy to use closure- hook and eye on stretchy elastic. I don't know about it being "ultra soft", it feels like most hair cutting capes...kind of plastic like. Works for my family's needs.
Review Title: Does the job
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids AUGNORYE {'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'} I really only wanted this for the cape and the scissors and the scissors are decent. I've been using them to shape the recent hair cut I gave myself. They are sharp and have a good weight to them. I have not used the thinning shears yet so I cannot speak to them. The other items in the kit are all pretty basic and cheap. I gave the thin plastic combs to my daughter to use with her dolls. The cape is thin and the strings in the back for tying seem flimsy. One of the strings is way to too making tying difficult. I have not had a need for any of the other items. I do like the storage case though...a nice compact way to keep everything together and easy to find when it is needed. I like the scissors 2 Pack Hair Towel Wrap Turban Microfiber Drying Shower and Bath, Twist Head Towels with Button, Magic Quick Dryer, Hair Care for Women and Girls, One Wrap Plus One Cap and Two Velvet Hair Bands MEETWIN {} A lot of quality in these products. Extremely soft like a blanket or child's plush making it very comfortable to use and no stress or tension on the hair. The turbine has been great for my daughter. Much easier to get on her thick hair after it has been freshly washed. The twist towels always hurt her ears and since I wash her hair in the shower, getting her towel wrapped head in a tee shirt could at times be difficult. The turbine is easy on her ears and comfy all over. It isn't bulky making it easier to get dressed with it on after a shower.
I use the wrap towel and it works great. Really soaks up the excess water. The button and elastic loop are sturdy, they don't feel like they will fall off or snap from regular use. The scrunchies are a bonus. They too are soft and velvety. Not needed for my hair styles or my daughter's really she still loves them even just to wear on her wrist.
I have multiple wrapping hair towels but these are my new favorites. Soft and comfortable Barber Hair Cutting Cape for Men Women, Made with Ultra Soft Silk Fiber, 63" x 57" SmoTecQ {'Package Dimensions': '11.8 x 9.2 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Works well. Full coverage and easy to use closure- hook and eye on stretchy elastic. I don't know about it being "ultra soft", it feels like most hair cutting capes...kind of plastic like. Works for my family's needs. Does the job
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Interests:** Haircare, DIY grooming, home haircuts, and effective hair drying solutions.
- **Product Preferences:** Values practical tools emphasizing quality, particularly in core items like scissors. The user has shown an increased appreciation for comfort in haircare products, favoring items that combine functionality with a user-friendly experience.
- **Usage Patterns:** Engages in self-grooming and cares for family, especially children, highlighting a focus on products that cater to diverse hair needs. The user prefers tools that simplify shared grooming routines and enhance coverage during haircuts.
- **Satisfaction Factors:** Enjoys the comfort and efficiency of specific items rather than entire kits, with a growing recognition for soft and comfortable haircare tools that minimize stress on hair.
- **Aesthetic Preferences:** Prefers compact, organized storage solutions that are lightweight and non-bulky, facilitating ease of dressing post-grooming.
- **Overall Rating Perspective:** Exhibits a balanced evaluation approach, recognizing both positives and negatives in products. Recent interactions reflect a pragmatic viewpoint that values functionality while acknowledging product characteristics, such as texture and ease of use for family-friendly applications.

The user maintains a strong focus on efficiency and quality in haircare tools while evolving preferences for comfort, usability, and effective coverage in products tailored for both personal and family grooming needs.
